titles.title: Young Savers' Tax Credit Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against tax for individuals age 18 through 30 for certain retirement contributions.
Young Savers' Tax Credit Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Young Savers' Tax Credit Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $500 annual tax credit for contributions to retirement plans by individuals who are age 30 or younger. Requires such contributions to equal at least 1% of such individuals' compensation.
